title: [QUESTION] Are there plans to support .Net 7?
body:
Apologies if this has been asked elsewhere. 

I noticed that SkiaSharp currently only lists support up to .Net 6. Were there any plans to add .Net7 support (and beyond)?

My main reason for asking is that we in the process of migrating away from `System.Drawing.Common` and want to identify the most suitable replacement. We are currently thinking SkiaSharp, but wanted to confirm current future plans for the project.

We also noticed that `MAUI.Graphics` is being pushed quite heavily at the moment in certain spheres. Is there any intention for that project to eventually supersede this one?

Thank you for all the hard work maintaining this repo.
